author: metasim
msg: Changed "AntEditor" to "AntModule", and made construct more JavaBean
compliant (primarily a default ctor). Now has "contextualize()" method

author: jon
msg: added patch by mariusz to fix NPE in UpToDate task

author: bodewig
msg: Avoid NullPointerException in <delete> if the current user is not
allowed to list the contents of a directory.

author: bodewig
msg: Add a nested mapper element to <native2ascii> to (1)give it more power
and (2) only convert those files that have actually changed.
